title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin looks at the Chiefs offense without star wide receiver Tyreek Hill and why they're still at the top of the league after another impressive win on Monday night. He defends Raiders head coach Josh McDaniels going for 2 and potentially costing his team the win. He gives you his Herd Hierarchy ranking the top 10 NFL teams after week 5. Plus, UCLA head coach Chip Kelly joins the show to talk about what makes his offense the best in country right now and QB Dorian Thompson-Robinson's break out season. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
